titles.title: Davis-Bacon Repeal Act
Davis-Bacon Repeal Act
To repeal the wage rate requirements commonly known as the Davis-Bacon Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

bill.summary:
Davis-Bacon Repeal Act - Repeals the Davis-Bacon Act (which requires that the locally prevailing wage rate be paid to various classes of laborers and mechanics working under federally-financed or federally-assisted contracts for construction, alteration, and repair of public buildings or public works).
States that references in any law to a wage requirement of the Davis-Bacon Act after the enactment of this Act shall be null and void.
